attributes.action: Demand justice for Baby P and life sentences that mean life for his killers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the public are sick to death of lawyers bleating on about prisoners human rights. No one cared about Baby P,s human rights did they? And now he,s dead. Justice MUST be done for this poor child and for thousands of others like him.
His killers must be kept in prison for a very long time. No time off for good behaviour, no time out early because of time spent on remand. We ALL want justice for this little boy. You prime minister have the power to ensure that this is done. Do the right thing. Get justice for this little boy. Keep his evil killers locked away in prison.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
